title: Boko Haram Leader, Responsible for Chibok Schoolgirl Kidnappings, Dies
content:
1. Boko Haram Leader, Responsible for Chibok Schoolgirl Kidnappings, Dies  The Wall Street Journal

  3. Recap: Boko Haram Leader, Abubakar Shekau Reported Killed  Channels Television
  4. Boko Haram leader tried to kill himself during clash with rivals, officials claim  The Guardian
  5. Nigeria's Boko Haram leader 'badly wounded': sources  Yahoo News
